Senior infielder Jana Johns during the game against Liberty in the Hall of Fame Tournament at the USA Softball Hall Of Fame Stadium on March  PERIOD

No PERIOD  Oklahoma   defeated Texas Tech    on Saturday afternoon PERIOD

Redshirt senior pitcher Shannon Saile got the start in the circle pitching in all seven innings and recording a careerhigh  strikeouts PERIOD She also allowed three hits PERIOD

The offense for OU continued its dominance in the second game of the day putting up eight hits PERIOD Freshman infielder Tiare Jennings led with three hits and senior infielder Jana Johns hit her second home run of the day PERIOD

  

Have a day JohnsJana Homers in BOTH games 

B4  OU  Tech    SoonerSportsTV pic.twitter.comsFQ2IYmO9S

The Sooners will look to complete a series sweep against Texas Tech at  p.m PERIOD CT on Sunday April  in Norman PERIOD
